short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop sustainable alternatives with just one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convenient browser extension that searches for used furniture alternatives on second hand marketplaces with just a click

1. Add recom to your browser for FREE 
2. Browse websites like ikea.com, wayfair.com, and structube.com as usual
3. recom will automatically pop-up on supported websites to help you reuse
4. With just one click you can find used alternatives on Marketplace and Craigslist üëÜ

‚ùå You no longer have manually open and query on second hand markets.

‚ôª We aim to eliminate the barriers users face when buying used products by automatically prompting and helping people reuse instead of buying. 

‚è∏ Pause before you buy - making an impact is easy with recom, a study* shows that reusing a sofa saves up to 55kg CO‚ÇÇ-eq.


Visit joinrecom.com for more information

* Learn more at wrap.org.uk/sites/default/files/2020-09/WRAP-Domestic%20Furniture%20chapter_final.pdf
